amendment.description: To provide funding to hire an additional 500 Border Patrol Agents; fully funding the promise Congress made to the American people to hire 2,000 new agents in FY2007 as authorized by the National Intelligence Reform Act of 2004 and as recommended by the 9/11 Commission.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3085 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3085 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S2261-2262; text: CR S2261) To provide funding to hire an additional 500 Border Patrol Agents; fully funding the promise Congress made to the American people to hire 2,000 new agents in FY2007 as authorized by the National Intelligence Reform Act of 2004 and as recommended by the 9/11 Commission.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3085 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
